data.name: Tiani
data.detailed_description: Virtual reality meets the world of old school role play! Good must fight and triumph over an evil power intent on the gathering of your land’s magic and the destruction of your people, the Keepers. As you fight your way through the World of Tiani with spell and sword, you have the voice of your sister, Alphita, helping you along the way. An old friend named Milo stands by your side when the fighting is grim. Built exclusively for VR, this adventure of spell and sword will immerse you in a world filled with creatures of darkness, bent on the destruction of all. Made by only one guy, I did my best and only get better as I move on... please, my friends tell me if there are any problems with game play, If you would be so kind, I will will always work to make any and all improvements to game play, love you guys... Gamers.... I mean, like forever........:) ...

data.short_description: Virtual reality meets the world of old school role play where the powers good must fight and triumph over an evil power intent on the destruction of your lands magic and the death of your people.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vr Headset required and 2 USB 3.0 ports
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-10600k / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vr Headset required and 2 USB 3.0 ports

content_descriptors.notes: Graphic violence, Mature themes due to the violent nature of the stories theme.
